Quest.Name: Clear the garden
Quest.Description: Defeat the snakes in the Alchemist's garden.

Quest.Name: Clear the field
Quest.Description: Kill snakes in the Farmer's field.

Quest.Name: Cleanse the corruption
Quest.Description: Kill corrupted wildlife in the corrupted forest.

Quest.Name: Eliminating Elementals
Quest.Description: Clear the elemental clearing of the angry spirits who reside there.

Quest.Name: Exterminate the Spider Queen. [DANGER]
Quest.Description: The spider queen lives just past the spider field across the bridge. She is extremely dangerous and should be approached with caution. If you manage to defeat her we would be able to fashion her large fang into a weapon to aid you.

Quest.Name: Removing the Threat [DANGER]
Quest.Description: The alpha wolf is a threat to my flock. He preys on them when they land to feed and has caused massive damage to us. Please adventurer, defeat the alpha wolf and bring peace to our land. I will reward you with a weapon fashioned from his gigantic fang.

Quest.Name: Handle the spider infestation.
Quest.Description: Please! You must help us clear the spiders across the bridge, they are blocking access to many merchants and travelers to our town.
